item.title: Street lamp still not wired in, 25th November
item.description:
Street lamp outside 510 footscray road was knocked over 6 weeks ago , 3 weeks later a new post was put in but the old damaged post wasn't taken out , I complained and 2 weeks later guy turned up put the lamp on the post but couldn't connect it as the old post has to come out and wiring changed to new one , he was on phone moaning about it , now 2 weeks later still not connected, old damaged one still there , pitch dark outside which is dangerous on this particular part of the road . Can we just get it sorted .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, County Gate, New Eltham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
